feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING IN EFFECT, Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:31 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 13.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 13.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 12.2°C
Wind: NNE 18 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then clearing. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High 19. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
